title: Font used on sixties film poster
content:
Hi,  
Looking to find something similar to this sixties film poster font.

Any suggestions?

I love the squared off internals on the 'O's

Any pointers greatly appreciated.

Ewan

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font-two.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419153221/http:/typophile.com/files/font-two.jpg) | 55.66 KB |
author: mercury66

comments.content: The closest I have for these few letters is [Stratum 2](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419153221/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/processtype/stratum2) Black, very close actually for the overall design but black looks not enough bold.

Hello, pretty close - I like very much. Love the description too, "...a synthesis of contemporary and historical sources. The austere geometry of early 20th century display faces..."

Thankyou
